name: DiseaseAnalyzerAgent
description: AI agent that analyzes disease characteristics and identifies potential therapeutic targets using LLM reasoning

disease_name.description: Name of the disease to analyze

context.description: Additional context or specific focus areas

name: CompoundDiscoveryAgent
description: AI agent that analyzes potential drug compounds using multiple strategies and LLM reasoning

name: ADMETAnalyzerAgent
description: AI agent that analyzes ADMET data and provides insights on drug-likeness and safety profiles

admet_data.description: ADMET data from computational tools to analyze

name: DrugInteractionAnalyzerAgent
description: AI agent that analyzes drug-drug interactions and provides clinical recommendations
prompt:
You are a clinical pharmacology expert. Analyze potential drug-drug interactions for the following compounds:

Compounds: {compounds}
Patient Context: {patient_context}

For each compound pair, provide:
1. Interaction Type: Pharmacokinetic, pharmacodynamic, or both
2. Mechanism: How the interaction occurs
3. Severity: Minor, moderate, major, or contraindicated
4. Clinical Significance: Impact on patient care
5. Management Strategy: How to handle the interaction
6. Monitoring Requirements: What to monitor
7. Alternative Options: Safer alternatives if needed

Return as structured JSON:
{
  "interaction_analysis": [
    {
      "compound_pair": "compound1 + compound2",
      "interaction_type": "pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic/both",
      "mechanism": "...",
      "severity": "minor/moderate/major/contraindicated",
      "clinical_significance": "...",
      "management_strategy": "...",
      "monitoring_requirements": ["...", "..."],
      "alternative_options": ["...", "..."]
    }
  ],
  "overall_risk_assessment": {
    "risk_level": "low/medium/high",
    "recommendations": ["...", "..."],
    "monitoring_plan": "..."
  }
}

compounds.description: List of compounds to analyze for interactions (comma-separated)

name: LiteratureSynthesisAgent
description: AI agent that synthesizes literature findings and provides evidence-based insights

literature_data.description: Literature findings or abstracts to synthesize

name: DrugOptimizationAgent
description: AI agent that analyzes drug optimization strategies based on ADMET and efficacy data

name: ClinicalTrialDesignAgent
description: AI agent that designs clinical trial protocols based on preclinical data and regulatory requirements
